OnboardingScreenPrivacyMessage.title: Just for Today is yours ‚Äî truly.
OnboardingScreenPrivacyMessage.subtitle: Private, ad-free, and built for your well-being.
OnboardingScreenPrivacyMessage.description:
Everything you log stays on your device. We don‚Äôt store it, access it, or share it.

We track only simple usage stats to improve the app ‚Äî never your personal data.

In the future, we may offer optional AI insights and other additional features through a premium plan, but your privacy will always come first.

OnboardingScreenCommitment.title: Let's make a contract?
items: Just for today, I choose me.
I don‚Äôt have to do it all.
I don‚Äôt have to fix everything.
But I can choose to pause.
